content: gridiron is a traditional beanie style hat that uses the basket rib stitch to create a grid effect the pattern makes for a quick project that can be knit up in less than 5 hours and consists of a four row repeat and standard crown decreasing this hat looks equally good on men and women skill level easy sizes one size fits most yarn options 1 skein lion brand jiffy 100% acrylic 135yds/ skein 1 skein martha stewarts crafts alpaca blend 40% wool 40% acrylic 20% alpaca 115yd/skein color shown magpie 1 skein cascade baby alpaca chunky 100% baby alpaca 108yds/ skein color shown 579 gauge 14 5 sts and 18 row per 4 x4 swatch in basket rib stitch pattern needles one 16″ circular needle in size needed to obtain gauge 4 dpn s in same size suggested needle size us 10 6mm tools removable stitch markers 1 tapestry needle this is a free pattern please share it with your friends and use it for charity knitting if you would like to produce this pattern commercially please contact wholesale@argylesheep com for licensing selling finished hats to friends and at craft shows is fine credit is appreciated for derivative works
